---
title: Typescript
description: Typescript guide for our application.
---

**Type Safety**: All generated files use TypeScript, ensuring strong typing for models, controllers, and routes.

**Custom Types**: Extend request objects for JWT payload or other custom properties:

```typescript
declare global {
  namespace Express {
    interface Request {
      user?: { id: number; email: string };
    }
  }
}
```

[Learn more about TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/)
